text:
Whenever the Charter requires that a Public Utilities Commission revenue bond issue be submitted to the voters, this Board by resolution adopted and signed by the Mayor shall submit the proposed revenue bond issue to the voters and shall set the date for the election. 
(Added by Ord. 12-00, File No. 992117, App. 2/11/2000)

heading.catch_text: UTILITY REVENUE BONDS; SUBMISSION TO VOTERS.
